field.name: api_url
field.label: SIMON API URL
field.description: Enter the base URL of your SIMON API server. This is where site data will be submitted. Example: http://localhost:3000 or https://api.simon.example.com

field.name: auth_key
field.label: Authentication Key
field.description: Enter your SIMON authentication key. This key is used to authenticate requests to the SIMON API. You can obtain this key from your SIMON dashboard or administrator.

field.name: enable_cron
field.label: Enable Automatic Data Submission
field.description: When enabled, the component will automatically submit site data to the SIMON API at the configured interval. This requires Joomla's cron system to be active.

field.name: cron_interval
field.label: Submission Interval (seconds)
field.description: How often to automatically submit site data to the SIMON API, in seconds. Default is 3600 (1 hour). Minimum is 60 seconds (1 minute). Examples: 3600 = 1 hour, 86400 = 1 day, 604800 = 1 week
